name: echo (itch) (Ocarina493)
description:
主角应邀参加了这个“虚拟现实”的心理康复训练。没想到系统竟然被坏人入侵，角色也被困其中。本应作为传递心意、疗愈心灵的游戏，为何传达了悲伤与浑浊呢？这份回声，，也有着传递的希望。游戏玩法上，我们设计了一套“别碰我”的机制，和受到心理挫伤的主角设定对应。

The protagonist was invited to participate in this 'virtual reality' psychological rehabilitation training. Unexpectedly, the system was invaded by bad guys, and the characters were trapped in it. It was supposed to be a game that conveys thoughts and heals the soul, but why does it convey sadness and turbidity? This echo, also has hope. In terms of gameplay, we have designed a set of 'don't touch me' mechanism, which corresponds to the setting of the protagonist who has suffered psychological contusion.
